titleStmt.title: Sathans sowing season. By William Est minister and preacher of Gods word in Bydeford.
titleStmt.author: Est, William, 1546 or 7-1625.
Est, William, 1546 or 7-1625. Mirrour of mercy.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes for Richard Bonian, and are to bee sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Floure de Luce,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: A-F8, G4 (first and last leaves blank?).
Formerly part 2 of: Est, William. The mirrour of mercy.
Imperfect: faded, with considerable loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Floure de Luce
